title: Type dealing with value, space, n color
content:
hey... I am kinda new..here.. and a beginner.with typography...   
   
could u please..show me some examples that dealing with type value, space and color..
author: ngoc723

comments.content: [Counterspace](http://web.archive.org/web/20131102051327/http:/counterspace.motivo.com/) has some excellent interactive tutorials about type & typography for beginners.

Hi ngoc le,   
   
I found some more info that deals with the title of   
this thread [here](http://web.archive.org/web/20131102051327/http:/www.microsoft.com/typography/hinting/how.htm).   
Hope it helps.
thanks..... it sure help a lot..
